data.title: Scientific Conference "Current Issues of Health Policy, Economics and Sociology"
data.meta_description: On June 8, the Conference “Current Issues of Health Policy, Economics and Sociology " was organized by the School of Medicine and Healthcare and the School of Humanities and Social Sciences at Caucasus University
data.text:
On June 8, the Conference “Current Issues of Health Policy, Economics and Sociology " was organized by the School of Medicine and Healthcare and the School of Humanities and Social Sciences at Caucasus University. Research papers were presented by researchers and students of different universities.

The best works presented at the conference will be published in the Scientific Peer-Reviewed Journal "Topical Issues of Health Policy, Economics and Sociology".

The aim of the conference was to promote scientific research in healthcare policy, healthcare economy and healthcare sociology; to develop and raise the level of research; popularization of scientific achievements; give specialists more opportunities to voice their opinions about the processes happening in healthcare economy and sociology in their country and everywhere else.

The following works were presented at the conference:

Academic Stress on Students

Keti Diasamidze, Tamta Sichinava, Mariam Khubulava - Sociology, School of Humanities and Social Sciences, Caucasus University

Head: Tengiz Verulava, Doctor of Medicine, Professor

Head: Tengiz Verulava, Doctor of Medicine, Professor

Head: Tengiz Verulava, Doctor of Medicine, Professor
